title: Maria
description: Our main caracter in the food making proccess. She makes recipies for every product! Feel free to contact her if you have questions about food ingridients.

title: Petar
description: Maria's asistant and our second caracter in the pet food making proccess. Animal lover, he makes the most delicious food for you favourive pet!

title: Sophia
description: Every pet toy you see in our collection is designed by her! She always explore and tries to make the most interesting toys for your little ones!
